https://tmrev.io/movie/734081-Darkling 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/hunQPPCIuzc7SuoMQIM2g2GwTlo.jpg The film deals with the metaphor of fear, but hidden everyday formless news about the life of the Serbian population in Kosovo. The film is inspired by a letter from a girl from Kosovo, dedicated to her missing father, read at the United Nations, in which she publicly addresses the difficult life of Serbs, especially Serb children in the enclaves. Darkling
